product_description: Nestle Coffee mate Zero Sugar Hazelnut flavored liquid creamer singles contain the same rich flavor, but with 55% fewer calories than our classic hazelnut creamer. Within each cup is a deliciously rich zero sugar creamer with nutty hazelnut notes that will enhance and enrich your coffee offering. Packaged in a convenient dispenser box, our liquid coffee creamer singles keep the counter clean, organized, and displayed beautifully. These creamer Singles don’t need to be refrigerated and can retain their irresistible flavor at room temperature for up to 9 months. Easy to use - just shake, open and pour. All Coffee mate foodservice single serve creamers are cholesterol-free, gluten free and kosher dairy. See the full Coffee mate ingredients statement for Coffee mate creamer ingredients. Coffee mate is America's #1 coffee creamer. With a variety of flavors and formats, Coffee mate has your coffee creamer needs covered. Delight your employees, customers and guests by offering Coffee mate liquid creamer in your workplace, break room or kitchen.

product_description: Nestle Coffee Mate Liquid Hazelnut Creamer for Coffee (16 oz): Have a delightful moment at any time of the day with Coffee mate coffee creamer hazelnut liquid. Unlike powdered coffee creamers that take time to dissolve, Coffee mate liquid creamer instantly makes a sweet, delicious hazelnut cappuccino or latte, rich and tasteful as milk, without lactose, gluten, or cholesterol. With Coffeemate coffee creamer non dairy liquid, add a flavorful hint of hazelnut to your morning or afternoon-break coffee for a relaxing, warm drink. Choose your favorite flavor within our assorted coffee creamer variety pack: Coffee mate Original Coffee Creamer, French Vanilla, Italian Sweet Cream, Hazelnut, and French Vanilla Sugar Free Liquid Coffee Creamer. Coffeemate creamer lasts up to 63 servings. Wake up your coffee with Nestle coffee mate creamer and enjoy its velvety goodness in the morning, at noon, or night! Store coffee mate creamer liquid in the refrigerator after opening.

name: Coffee mate Hazelnut Flavored Coffee Creamer, Non-Dairy, Gluten-Free, Liquid Creamer for Coffee, Cholesterol Free, 126 Servings
short_description: FOR THE LOVE OF COFFEE Ditch your boring coffee routine and upgrade your brew game with our Coffee mate Hazelnut Flavored Coffee Creamer. We’ve been working on our recipes since 1961, so we know what we’re doing when it comes to our flavored coffee creamers SNAP and EBT item in eligible states

ICONICALLY NON-DAIRY AND GLUTEN-FREE We’re all about creating tasty creamers that everyone can enjoy. Cheers to inclusive indulgence with our gluten-free, cholesterol-free, and non-dairy flavored creamer for coffee
HOT, ICED, OR MIXED Our liquid creamer is your coffee’s new BFF — We’re here for your coffee mug, your cup and your martini glass, any time you’re looking to sweeten up your cup
MVP OF CREAMERS Whoever said they didn’t like coffee creamer clearly hasn’t tried Coffee mate. Make your coffee goals a reality with our Hazelnut flavored creamer
KEEP IT CHILL Keep your Coffee mate creamer chilled for that perfect Hazelnut flavor. Pop it in the fridge after opening and use your creamer within 14 days, if it even lasts that long
VERY SIP COUNTS Cheers to a brighter tomorrow with every mug Our Hazelnut flavored creamer comes in recyclable packaging
product_description: It’s time to make your coffee breaks iconic with Coffee mate Hazelnut Flavored Coffee Creamer. You’re going to fall in love with our liquid coffee creamer, taking you from your early morning grind to your late-night fuel up with up to one hundred and twenty-six 1 tbsp servings. We’re here for your coffee mug, your iced coffee glass and your midnight martini. Dietary preferences? We have those covered too – Our Coffee mate liquid creamer is non-dairy, cholesterol-free, and gluten-free. We really like coffee, just as much as we like our recyclable packaging. Keep your Hazelnut flavored creamer cool in the fridge for up to 14 days (if you don’t finish it right away). Ready to level up your coffee game with our Hazelnut flavored creamer yet?

product_description: Nestle Coffee mate Powder Creamer Hazelnut (15 oz.): Have a delightful moment at any time of the day with Coffeemate Hazelnut powdered coffee creamer. Smooth and indulgent, this hazelnut flavoring creamer transforms your coffee into a sweet, delicious hazelnut cappuccino or latte, rich and tasteful as milk, without lactose, gluten, or cholesterol. With its practical creamer dispenser with a snap lid, just pour a flavorful hint of hazelnut into your morning or afternoon coffee, stir, and sip a relaxing, warm drink. Coffee mate coffee creamer non dairy powder is lactose-free, gluten-free, and contains only 15 calories per spoon. Each 15 oz Coffeemate creamer powder bottle makes 210 servings. Choose your favorite flavor within our assorted: Coffee mate Original Creamer, French Vanilla, Italian Sweet Cream, Creamy Chocolate, Hazelnut, and French Vanilla Sugar Free Coffee Creamer. Wake up your coffee with Coffee mate powdered creamer. Store Coffee mate powder coffee creamer in a cool, dry place.
